RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THINK IT THRU drew even on the backside working clear on the far turn moving to a commanding lead in upper stretch adding on late while ridden out. KESTENNA (GB) dropped back early making a contending move on the far turn losing momentum in upper stretch using even action to get up for place. IRON BERTIE set the pace being hooked on the backside chasing through the far turn into upper stretch wearing down late. AWESOME INCENTIVE went evenly moving up on the far turn then retreated in upper stretch. SWEET TOOTSIE LU was never involved. IRON WILMA tracked early then gave way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked backside, chased to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Incentive
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, vied far turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tootsie Lu
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Wilma
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked early, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Think It Thru
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, clear far turn, drew off inside lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Kestenna (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back early, contending move far turn, evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WATCHING SNOW FLY set a pressured pace through the turn edging to daylight in upper stretch widening under a drive. METALLIC CAT pressed in bid on the turn chasing through the stretch saving place in the three path. SOMESAYNEIGH pressed the pace saving ground to upper stretch weakening along the rail there. ALL ROADS TO DENIS faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: All Roads to Denis
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Metallic Cat
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up on the turn, extended three path lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Watching Snow Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, edged clear top lane, widened driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Somesayneigh
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POUR ME A DOUBLE pressed up on the turn brushing with foe in upper stretch extended abreast rival to clear late. KAPHAVATA pressed a narrow lead dueling inside of rival brushing in upper stretch ceding grudgingly late. KAZTHAROS raced evenly throughout holding the others safe. T C GREELEY chased early weakening on the turn. VENICE BEACH was never involved. PRIZE FIGHTER flashed early speed then faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Prize Fighter
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Venice Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, held others

ENTRY.NAME: Kaphavata
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, brushed top lane, ceded grudgingly inside

ENTRY.NAME: T C Greeley
ENTRY.COMMENT: vhased early, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Pour Me a Double
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up turn, brushed top lane, cleared abreast foe

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 25, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOON ME AGAIN sent clear set the pace to upper stretch digging in there holding safe under a drive. ISLAND WINTER tracked the pace to upper stretch rallying late securing place. CAPTAIN ANNE chased the pace through the turn extending in upper stretch weakening late. SUGAR BRITCHES off slowly raced evenly lacking more. OUT OF ROMANCE played no factor. SMOOKIE was always outrun. BEE WINGS showed little. UNDETECTED collapsed near the turn, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Me Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, held driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Anne
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Undetected
ENTRY.COMMENT: collapsed near the turn, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Wings
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Island Winter
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked the pace, bid upper stretch saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Britches
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, raced evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Smookie
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 3 lbs. (Cl aiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOGA QUEEN pressed the pace through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch pulling away late being ridden out. KENDAL GRACE saved ground rallying late along the rail getting up for place. KILBRITTAIN'S RED sent hard pressed on the inside through the turn ceding in upper stretch weakening late. LADY MARVEL pressed early then dropped off on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Kilbrittain's Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Kendal Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, rallied late on rail saving place

ENTRY.NAME: Yoga Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: Willoughby Jr Jack and Clark Robert Lee
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, clear top lane, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Marvel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, dropped off on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 25 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowance s)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NAPA VALLEY pressed the pace in a two horse duel the entire trip moving in tandem down the lane getting up gamely inside. HIPPODROME pressured the pace moving abreast rival the entire way matching strides down the lane missing in the gamest of efforts. STAR ENTERTAINER slow early gave a mild rally on the far turn racing evenly down the lane to best the others. AMERICAN NIGHTMARE stalked the pace weakening on the far turn. BUZZER laid close up for three quarters then weakened in upper stretch. INDIAN EMPIRE fractious in the gate was rushed out giving early retreat.

ENTRY.NAME: Napa Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled inside rival, in tandem to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Hippodrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast entire way, in tandem to wire

ENTRY.NAME: American Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, weakened far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, folded early

ENTRY.NAME: Buzzer
ENTRY.COMMENT: close for 3/4, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Star Entertainer
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally far turn, evenly to best others

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 106. Allowance Purse 28600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 25 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter Races Not Considered) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY BUDDY B rushed into the turn would duel between horses into upper stretch locking up inside of rival late digging deep to prevail. WILLISTON WAY sent hard into the turn dueled three deep into upper stretch then abreast rival the final sixteenth bearing down to the end. KOSHER COWBOY away alertly set a pressured pace dueling on the inside of rivals in upper stretch weakening late angling out to hold the others safe. HERO'S MAN slow early lagged to upper stretch racing evenly there to best the others. BAYTOWN BEAR hustled along chased through the turn making no headway before weakening in upper stretch. BEVERLY PARK flashed early speed then faded on the turn. TORONTOTORO had brief position then gave way on the turn. MACHISMO was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Beverly Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded on turn

ENTRY.NAME: Torontotoro
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Kosher Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, dueled on inside of foes, short

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased on turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Hero's Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, evenly to best others

ENTRY.NAME: Machismo
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Williston Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard into turn, dueled three deep then abreast, gave all

ENTRY.NAME: My Buddy B
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed into turn, dueled between into lane, up gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 25 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSE'S PEPINO went evenly rallying on the far turn surging clear into upper stretch winning as much the best. JONES FALLS advanced on the backside pressing on the far turn, overpowered in upper stretch stayed after it a clear second best. FIRE KING gained to press on the backside dueling on a narrow lead on the far turn being passed into upper stretch weakening while holding spot. GLOBAL PRIDE tracked the pace chasing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch finishing evenly. RESVALON hustled clear set the pace dueling on the far turn wearing out in upper stretch. FOGGY ALBION was never involved. OLD FORTY FIVE raced evenly fading to upper stretch. CAJUN BAYOU was always outrun. BLACK BULL played no factor. GALLIPOLIS trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Jones Falls
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed far turn, overpowered lane, salvaged place

ENTRY.NAME: Old Forty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, faded to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Black Bull
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Foggy Albion
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Fire King
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, dueled far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Rose's Pepino
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, rallied far turn, drew clear upper stretch, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Global Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, chased far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Gallipolis
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Resvalon
ENTRY.COMMENT: husrled clear, set pace, dueled far turn, wore out
